thread.title: Watch LIVE: Falcons Championship Countdown

author: AJC Sports
title: Watch LIVE: Falcons Championship Countdown
text:
The Atlanta Journal-Constitution and the Channel 2 Action News bring you "Falcons Championship Countdown," a livestream from Houston - site of the Super Bowl matchup between the Atlanta Falcons and New England Patriots.
The AJC's Jeff Schultz and Channel 2's Zach Klein -- hosts of the “We Never Played The Game” podcast -- host a roundtable discussion leading up to Sunday’s big game in Houston.
Tune in here from 1:30 p.m. to 2 p.m. on game day to get full analysis from our reporters.

AJC Super Bowl 2017 team and athlete news
Fan and celebrity news from Houston and Atlanta
